original_title: Muddy Waters: Messin' With The Blues
overview: A legendary concert featuring some of the most well known blues songs of all time. Recorded live at the Montreux Jazz Festival! Switzerland in 1974. This film captures on DVD some of the most influential and endearing musicians of the century. Chicago Blues legends Muddy Waters, Buddy Guy and Junior Wells.
title: Muddy Waters: Messin' With The Blues
